location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Tribal & Communications Map of Area No. 1 (Northern Jazirah)'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on Paper in ColourDimensions: 544 x 316mm

mods.abstract: This map shows hydrology, settlements, and approximate distribution of various tribal groups in Iraq's Northern Jazirah region, displayed as a military area. The map also shows railways, tracks, telegraph lines, landing grounds, and post and telegraph offices.
